channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Yen Weakness Raises Prospect of Forex Intervention
item.description: USD/JPY pushed above 155 after the BOJ decided to hold rates and ING said the prospect of still-higher U.S. yields and a hesitant BOJ suggests Japanes...

item.title: Adobe shares suffer steepest drop in over two years on disappointing revenue guidance
item.description: Adobe shares tumbled after the software vendor issued revenue guidance that fell short of analysts' estimates.

item.title: Costco quarter signals record stock run is not done yet. Here's our new price target
item.description: With gross margins and paid memberships trending higher, this rally to fresh highs can continue.

item.title: Trump Isn't President Yet. He's Already Spooking the Fed.
item.description: Inflation risks from the incoming administration’s agenda can’t be ignored any longer.

item.title: Stock Futures Edge Up After Fed-Fueled Selloff

item.title: Euro Credit Default Swaps Rise Following Fed Interest-Rate Decision
item.description: The cost of insuring euro-denominated credit against default using credit default swaps rose on reduced appetite for risk after the Fed signaled a slo...

item.title: Costco beats on earnings as e-commerce sales jump
item.description: Costco drew stronger online sales and higher traffic, as shoppers bought jewelry, luggage and more.

item.title: Copper Falls After Fed Signals Rate-Cut Slowdown
item.description: Copper prices fell more than 1% after the Fed’s hawkish shift drove important commodity currencies sharply lower, Peak Trading Research said, adding “...

item.title: Micron shares plunge on weak second-quarter guidance
item.description: Micron shares plunged in extended trading after the chipmaker issued weaker-than-expected second-quarter guidance.

item.title: AI chipmaker Broadcom shares soar 17% despite mixed quarterly results — here's why
item.description: We're increasing our price target on the stock after a slew of positive AI updates.
